subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: Amaury Leveaux broke the men’s 50-meter butterfly short-course world record, and Coralie Balmy set a record in the women’s 200 freestyle at the French swimming championships in Angers. Leveaux finished in 22.29 seconds and Balmy in 1:53.18.
snippet: Amaury Leveaux broke the men’s 50-meter butterfly short-course world record, and Coralie Balmy set a record in the women’s 200 freestyle at the French swimming championships in Angers. Leveaux finished in 22.29 seconds and Balmy in 1:53.18.
